content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you having an issue with heating, cooling, or something else in your home?
Yeah, hi. My AC isn’t working right. Not sure what’s wrong, it’s just making a weird noise and doesn’t get cold anymore.
Thanks for letting us know. We can help with your AC issue. May I have your name to get started with scheduling a technician?
Thank you, Greg. Could you provide your home address so we can send a technician to the right location?
Sure, it’s 1125 Maple Drive, Cedar Point.
Thanks, Greg. We service that area. When would you like our technician to come by? Is there a day or time that works best for you?
Um, I don’t know. As soon as possible? It’s real hot today.
I understand! I’ll check our schedule for the earliest available appointment for you.
We can have a technician come out today between 12pm and 2pm. Does that work for you?
Yeah, I guess so. How much is this gonna cost though? I don’t want to get surprised by a big bill.
Good question! I can get you a price estimate for an AC diagnostic visit. There may be additional costs if repairs are needed, but we’ll let you know before any work is done.
The initial AC diagnosis fee is typically $75. If repairs are needed, the technician will provide a quote first. No surprise charges, and you decide what gets done.
Alright, as long as they tell me first. Go ahead and book that time for me.
Great! I’ve booked your appointment for today between 12pm and 2pm. You’ll get a reminder before the technician arrives. Let us know if you have any more questions!
